entry.title: Pride Of Darjeeling - Rare First Flush Tea in Pinewood Box with Zardosi Work on Velvet Pouch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Black Tea
Price: 37.83

Description :
An outstanding and rare First Flush Tea packed in a Pinewood Box for connoisseurs of Golden Tips across the globe. Originating in Darjeeling, from the area which produces one of the finest teas in the world, this early spring selection consisting of the most tender leaves, has a delightful floral aroma with a mellowed Colour and makes for a very extraordinary and outstanding cup to relish.
Packaging:
Velvet pouch with a handcrafted peacock in golden thread, packed in an elegant pinewood box.

entry.title: Pearl Haze Darjeeling White Tea First Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: White Tea
Price: 3.00 - 116.30 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Open green tender leaf & bud sets with few silvery tipped leaves.
Tea Colour:
Very pale green
Tea Infusion:
Bright green leaf & bud sets with a soft vegetal nose
New 2024 Spring Tea from the Ringtong estate in Darjeeling. The tender buds are plucked by experienced pluckers and then naturally withered and shade dried without any kind of fermentation or processing. This way the nutrients of the leaves are fully preserved. This very natural tea has a highly mellowed & extremely delicate vegetal flavour that is extremely delicate and satiating with the mild floral aroma. The accrual of multiple health benefits is another endearing factor ro drink and relish this wonderful offering.

entry.title: Moondrop Gold Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 5.03 - 194.69 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly silvery/golden tips with a token presence of black/brown open leaves.
Tea Colour:
Bright golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly coppery leaves with a striking & flavoury nose.
Prime Second Flush tea from the picturesque and Darjeeling's oldest tea estate - Puttabong. An extremely speciality tea, carefully harvested on sunny days - amidst the seasonal rains - this tea is indeed a visual delight. The unmissable and pleasant aroma, followed by the sharp & rare fruitiness, completely overwhelms the palate and leaves behind a memorable aftertaste. Perhaps, the most unique offering this season.

entry.title: Pride of Sikkim Rare Organic Temi Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 26.10

An outstanding & rare Second Flush Sikkim Tea meant for connoisseurs of Golden Tips Teas across the globe. Originating from the Temi Tea  Estate which produces one of the finest teas in the world, this selection with a unique and typical flavor, is packed in an elegant velvet bag adorned by the knot to Eternity, articulately hand-embroidered in the golden thread (zari) in the zarodi form of craftsmanship and placed into a window-lid pinewood box.

entry.title: Summer Moondrop Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 4.37 - 169.42 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Dark grey/black leaves with several silvery/golden tips.
Tea Colour:
Amber
Tea Infusion:
Bright coppery leaves & shoots with a very pleasant nose.
Prime Second Flush tea from the scenic Puttabong estate in Darjeeling. The very special Moondrop plucking is a highly solicited and awaited variant. The rich clonal flavour is very overwhelming and permeates across the palate. The pleasant fruitiness with the whiff of muscatel, further adds to the magnificence of this offering.

entry.title: Moonlight Rhythm Darjeeling First Flush Black Tea 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 10.25 - 8795.00 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Dark grey, rolled & green open leaves with silver tips in abundance.
Tea Colour:
Pale yellow
Tea Infusion:
Mostly green leaves & buds with coppery hues with a soft floral nose.
New 2024 Spring Tea from the well-known Turzum Estate in Darjeeling. The tender buds have been harvested by experienced pluckers and minimally processed very delicately. A very pleasant and enticing flavour softly unfurls in the palette as one sips into this heavenly brew. The overwhelming mellowness with mild fruitiness combined with the alluring floral aroma. The clonal notes add to make this one of the most outstanding offerings to relish.

entry.summary:

entry.title: Pyramid-Shaped Borosilicate Glass Teapot with Steel Infuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Tea Accessories
Price: 11.24 - 14.62 (3 variants)

Elegantly handcrafted food-grade borosilicate clear & plain glass teapot with detachable micromesh infuser & lid, most ideal for brewing leaf tea . Aesthetically-designed  tapered square to give the most pleasant experience whilst steeping leaf teas. The infuser has hundreds of minute pores to allow free flow of water in and out whilst the leaves are confined within the infuser so that leaf particles do not flow into the cup. An ideal apparatus & gift for lovers of whole leaf teas. The teapot allows the loose leaves to be steeped till the desired duration to attain proper strength, whilst the entire process can be minutely observed much to one's delight.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India

Price: 11.10

An exotic White Tea from Darjeeling with each leaf picked tenderly and selectively just before sunrise. The fairly long, light & fluffy leaves of this tea type are an absolute visual delight. Cultivated in the picturesque slopes of the Himalayas at altitudes upto 2000 meters, this rare tea type has excellent health benefits and a very high amount of anti-oxidants, vitamins and minerals.

entry.title: Roseherb Green Tea - Royal Brocade Cloth Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Green Tea
Price: 10.85

A soothing blend of pure green tea and a variety of exotic medicinal herbs from the Himalayas in India. This light and mellow herbal green tea is characteristic of a rich grassy aroma with sweetish and rosy undertones, a smooth flavour with fairly bright Colour in the cup. 

Elevate your tea ritual with an experience that transcends the ordinary. Discover a moment of quiet luxury where each cup invites you to unwind and reconnect with nature’s artistry. The intricate blend embodies a journey of sensory delight, evoking a refined atmosphere of heritage and modern elegance. Its serene allure makes it the perfect companion for moments of reflection, celebration, or simply savoring the finer things in life.
Disclaimer:
Brocade fabric design may change from time to time and may not be the same as shown in the website.

entry.title: Chocolate Flavoured Black Tea - Tin Can
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Black Tea
Price: 9.75

A refreshing blend of high grow full leaf black tea combined with natural extracts of Chocolate. This bright Colouring tea makes for a robust and flavoury cup.
Brewing Notes:
Put 2 grams of Chocolate Black Tea Leaves in a cup. Pour 200ml of freshly boiled water over the leaves. Steep for 3-5 Minutes. Add sugar or honey as sweetener. Ice cubes may be added to chill. Best served without or with very little milk.

Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Black Tea

Select full leaf Tea, skilfully blended with the oil of
Bergamot with a fragrant, refreshing flavour. Earl Grey was popularised by the
British, hence the faint English undertone associated with it. If there was to be a ‘most
fashionable Tea award’ - it would arguably go to Earl Grey Tea with its immense popularity
among the creme-de-la-creme.
